Text: Any info for this? Such as date,ripping info or anything?

A DVD was officially released containing both the "Beautiful Dreamer" documentary and this concert. It is basically the audio layer from that DVD in 16-bit FLAC (intended for audio CD), obviously without additionnal EQing, compression and stuff. 

on the DVD this seems to be a "studio live show"; as the crowd is at most 200 and standing, and a quick search on the internet didn't tell me more about the date this was recorded. Maybe you can do your own research on this one ?
